backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling user profiles and admin‑restricted CRUD operations for job sources with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report mapping implemented features to related files, components, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining the app’s custom amber/orange OKLCH color palette for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the Mogambo page title, favicon, metadata, and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app shell configuring routing, theming, header/footer layout, and first‑time profile setup handling.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an access‑denied message with a link back to the homepage for unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard that checks caller authentication and admin status, showing loading or denial screens as needed.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSlot.tsx: Renders a placeholder ad slot based on settings and slot type, using local ad configuration.
UI panel for enabling ads and setting the AdSense publisher ID with local persistence.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Top navigation header showing the Mogambo logo, user greeting, admin link, and login/logout controls.
frontend/src/components/JobResultsList.t: Displays job search results with loading, error, empty states, and links to apply.
frontend/src/components/JobSourceEditorD: Dialog for adding or editing job source configurations with form fields and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/JobSourcesManage: Manages job sources in a table with toggling, editing, and deletion controls.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting the user to enter and save their name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdSettings.ts: Loads, stores, and updates local ad settings using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for managing user profiles, admin checks, and CRUD operations on job sources with toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes with utility additions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin interface with tabs to manage job sources and ad settings, including dialogs for adding or editing sources.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Job search page with keyword/location form, ad slots, and displaying queried job results.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, supporting hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, OKLCH-based color system, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Configuration file describing project metadata, required images, and a list of existing features for a job‑listing aggregation app. Includes schema versioning, admin/auth notes, and UI/AdSense requirements.
